      • googleJavaFormat

        public void googleJavaFormat(String version)
        Uses the given version of [google-java-format](https://github.com/google/google-java-format) to format source code. Limited to published versions. See [issue #33](https://github.com/diffplug/spotless/issues/33#issuecomment-252315095) for an workaround for using snapshot versions.

        If the user hasn't specified the files yet, we'll assume he/she means all of the java files.
